languages.text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: Первая атакующая сила навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (12): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно всем целям, а также 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. Прямой урон: урон, который нельзя уменьшить за счет параметров или {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} цели. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} 12: The first use of an attacking Navigator Power does not set the attacking Navigator powers on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}. The second use of a Navigator power will deal an additional +12 damage to all targets and 12 direct damage to the Navigator. Direct damage: damage that isn't reduced by the target's characteristics or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} 12: the first use of any attacking Navigator power does not set it on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}. The second use of any Navigator power will deal an additional +12 damage to all targets and 12 direct damage to the Navigator. Direct damage: damage that isn't reduced by the target's characteristics or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} 12: the first use of any attacking Navigator power does not set it on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g}. The second use of any Navigator power will deal an additional +12 damage to all targets and 12 direct damage to the Navigator. Direct damage: damage that isn't reduced by the target's characteristics or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: Первая атакующая сила навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (12): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно всем целям, а также 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. Прямой урон: урон, который нельзя уменьшить за счет параметров или {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} цели. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}
languages.original_text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Первая атакующая сила навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} 12: после первого использования атакующей силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование силы навигатора наносит +12 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 12 прямого урона самому навигатору. Прямой урон: урон, который нельзя уменьшить с помощью характеристик или {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} цели. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

Первая атакующая сила навигатора за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} требует на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} 12: после первого использования атакующей силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование силы навигатора наносит +12 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 12 прямого урона самому навигатору. Прямой урон: урон, который нельзя уменьшить с помощью характеристик или {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусов{/g} цели. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}（12）：每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成12点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此外，导航者本人也会承受12点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 直击伤害：此伤害无法被目标的属性或{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果减免。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}12：首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。第二次使用导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成12点伤害，导航者本人也会承受12点直击伤害。 直击伤害：此伤害无法被目标的属性或加成效果减免。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g} +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で最初に攻撃する航宙士のパワーの消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が-1される {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}：ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}+12、および航宙士に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}12を与える。 直接ダメージ：ターゲットのパラメータや{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}で軽減できないダメージ。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+15増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+10増加
languages.original_text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で最初に攻撃する航宙士パワーの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}消費−1 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}12：攻撃する航宙士のパワーを初めて使用する時、{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は適用されない。航宙士のパワーを2回目に使用する際には全てのターゲットに対し追加ダメージを12、航宙士に直接ダメージを12付与。 直接ダメージ：ターゲットの数値または{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}では軽減されないダメージ。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}+10

languages.text: El primer poder de navegante ofensivo realizado cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} (12): El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige +12 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a todos los objetivos y 12 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante. Daño directo: daño que no se puede reducir mediante los parámetros ni las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} del objetivo. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}
languages.original_text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: El primer poder de navegante ofensivo realizado cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} cuesta −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} menos. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} 12: El primer uso de un cualquier poder de navegante ofensivo no deja ese poder en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}recuperación{/g}. El segundo uso de cualquier poder de navegante inflige +12 de daño adicional a todos los objetivos y 12 de daño directo al navegante. Daño directo: Daño que no puede verse reducido por las características y {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} del objetivo. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: Die erste angreifende Navigator-Kraft in jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} kostet −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} (12): Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und dem Navigator 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. Direktschaden: Schaden, der nicht von den Parametern oder {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} des Ziels reduziert werden kann. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Die erste angreifende Navigator-Kraft in jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} kostet −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} weniger. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} 12: Die erste Nutzung einer beliebigen angreifenden Navigator-Kraft leitet nicht die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} ein. Die zweite Nutzung einer beliebigen Navigator-Kraft fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +12 Schaden zu, dem Navigator selbst 12 Direktschaden. Direktschaden: Schaden, der nicht von den Eigenschaften des Ziels oder {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} reduziert wird. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: À chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du Navigateur coûte 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} (12) : à chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du Navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du Navigateur au cours du même tour inflige 12 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 12 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au Navigateur. Dégâts directs : dégâts ne pouvant pas être réduits par les paramètres ou les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de la cible. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: The first attacking Navigator power each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} costs −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} less. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (12): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +12 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to all targets and 12 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. Direct Damage: damage that cannot be reduced by the target's parameters or {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g}. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Le premier pouvoir de Navigateur offensif de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} coûte -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de moins. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} 12 : aucun {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} ne s'applique à la première utilisation d'un pouvoir de Navigateur offensif. La deuxième utilisation d'un pouvoir de Navigateur inflige +12 points de dégâts supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 12 points de dégâts directs au Navigateur. Dégâts directs : dégâts non réduits par les caractéristiques ou les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de la cible. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
